hi dellefs0. hw r ya? i see that u have become a recognized uploader now on tpb. good going mate. i hope you encode more 720p's. and i hope u do ROTLD II in 720p too.. he he.. 

just to be asking you.. might sound a little strange though.. is there any way you can colorize a black n white movie in a 720p.. i knw this sounds funny.. but just asking.. if u can do it.. then i do have some recommendations..

Thanks pal.. do u have a fan page.. like facebook or smthing. wud like 2 join u der..

im a fan of Sir Alfred Hitchcock's. i really wish they colorize all of his works. industry really needs ppl like Ingrid Bergman and Orson Welles today.

hey mate.. i am crazy about B grade horror movies too. do ya like Friday the 13th series.. it wud really be fun watchng the series in a 720p mate..
if you cud do the 720p unrated versions of part 4, 5, 6, 7, 8.. it wud be wonderful. i cud also assits you with the IMDB links

Thanks for the upload.
